filter.name: SeverityMatchFilter
filter.description:
Filter {@code SeverityMatchFilter} decides audit events according to the severity level of the event.

SeverityMatchFilter can suppress Checks that have Treewalker or Checker as parent module.

property.name: severity
property.description: Specify the severity level of this filter.

property.name: acceptOnMatch
property.description: Control whether the filter accepts an audit event if and only if there is a match between the event's severity level and property severity. If acceptOnMatch is {@code false}, then the filter accepts an audit event if and only if there is not a match between the event's severity level and property severity.
